<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><catalog_conditions/><catalog_item/><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestedInclude');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','createRequested');
	var quant = g_form.getValue('quantity');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_quant',quant);
	var applicant = g_user.getFullName();
	ga.addParam('sysparm_fullName',applicant);
	ga.getXML(callBack);
	function callBack(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	}
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Test</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-30 07:41:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6e0f30b52f013010d589d7492799b602</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Warehouse Management" source="x_655585_whmg">56e012ed2f303010d589d7492799b623</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Warehouse Management">56e012ed2f303010d589d7492799b623</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_6e0f30b52f013010d589d7492799b602</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-30 07:41:05</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Warehouse VS">9e3e996d2fc13010d589d7492799b6e3</variable_set><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
